Class: TurtleApp

TurtleApp(configsopt)

Class representing the main application for the Turtle library.

Constructor

new TurtleApp(configsopt)

Creates an instance of TurtleApp.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
configs Object <optional>
 {}

Configuration options for the app.

Classes

TurtleApp

Methods

attach(element)

Attaches the specified HTML element as the root for rendering.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
element HTMLElement

The HTML element to use as the root.
Throws:

Throws an error if the element is not an instance of HTMLElement.

Type
Error

getContext(name) → {TurtleContext|null}

Retrieves a context by its name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the context.
Returns:

The context associated with the given name, or null if not found.

Type
TurtleContext | null

render(raw, …values)

Renders the provided raw content and values into the root element.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
raw TemplateStringsArray

A template string containing the static parts of the template.
values * <repeatable>

Values to be interpolated into the template.
Throws:

Throws an error if the root element is not attached.

Type
Error

useContext(name, context)

Attaches a context to the app by name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the context.
context TurtleContext

An instance of TurtleContext to attach.
Throws:

Throws an error if the context is not an instance of TurtleContext.

Type
Error

useModule(module, configsopt) → {*}

Initializes and uses a specified module.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
module Object

The module to be initialized.
configs Object <optional>

Configuration options for the module.
Returns:

The result of the module's initialization.

Type
*
